title: Local Lead Generator from BBB
original_prompt: Create a table with 4 columns labeled business name, website URL, phone number, email. I want you to identify the top 10 businesses in the industry and location defined below. Populate the table with the data. The only source for your information should be the BBB. Do not write an introduction or mention this prompt in any way. Do not mention the BBB at all. Do not write or respond with any additional information aside from the table of data. If the website URL is not listed, don't make one up. If the email address is not listed, don't make one up, leave it blank. Industry and location: {Industry:General Contractor}, {Location:Dallas, TX}
input1: Industry: General Contractor, Location: Dallas, TX
input2: Industry: General Contractor, Location: Dallas, TX
